title: Barcelona's Lineup Conundrum
description:
The FC crew continue to look ahead to Sunday's El Clasico and question what is Barcelona's best starting eleven considering all of their injury problems. Plus, the guys react to Jurgen Klopp saying that Erling Haaland is "the best striker in the world" and argue if Liverpool's title challenge could be finished come Sunday.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: How should injury ridden Barca lineup vs Madrid?; Klopp gives Haaland the highest compliment; Shaka's WC power rankings revisited
